anya-e0105n30:1_0: Sumaṅgalavilāsiniṁ nāma dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathaṁ pana ācariyo sumaṅgalapariveṇavāsinā dāṭhānāgattherena āyācito akāsi.
anya-e0105n30:6_0: Sā hi mahāaṭṭhakathāya, sāramādāya niṭṭhitā esā’’ti dī. ni. aṭṭha. 3. nigamanakathā.
anya-e0105n30:7_0: Papañcasūdaniṁ nāma majjhimanikāyaṭṭhakathaṁ bhadantabuddhamittattherena pubbe mayūradūtapaṭṭane attanā saddhiṁ vasantena āyācito akāsi.
anya-e0105n30:12_0: Sā hi mahāaṭṭhakathāya, sāramādāya niṭṭhitā esā’’ti ma. ni. aṭṭha. 3. nigamanakathā.
anya-e0105n30:13_0: Sāratthappakāsiniṁ nāma saṁyuttanikāyaṭṭhakathaṁ bhadantajotipālattherena āyācito akāsi.
anya-e0105n30:17_0: Yaṁ samadhigataṁ puññaṁ, tenāpi jano sukhī bhavatū’’ti saṁ. ni. aṭṭha. 3.5.nigamanakathā.
anya-e0105n30:18_0: Manorathapūraṇiṁ nāma aṅguttaranikāyaṭṭhakathaṁ bhadantajotipālattherena dakkhiṇaindiyaraṭṭhe kañcipurādīsu
anya-e0105n30:18_1: ca sīhaḷadīpe mahāvihāramhi ca attanā saddhiṁ vasantena āyācito,
anya-e0105n30:18_2: tathā jīvakenāpi upāsakena piṭakattayapāragubhūtena vātāhatepi aniñjamānasabhāve dume viya aniñjamānasaddhamme
anya-e0105n30:29_0: Sā hi mahāaṭṭhakathāya, sāramādāya niṭṭhitā esā;
anya-e0105n30:31_0: Sabbāgamasaṁvaṇṇana, manoratho pūrito ca me yasmā;
anya-e0105n30:32_0: Etāya manoratha pūraṇīti nāmaṁ tato assā’’ti a. ni. aṭṭha. 3.11.nigamanakathā.
anya-e0105n30:33_0: Imā ca pana catasso āgamaṭṭhakathāyo kurumāno ācariyabuddhaghoso mahāmahindattherenābhataṁ mūlaṭṭhakathāsaṅkhātaṁ
anya-e0105n30:33_1: mahāaṭṭhakathaṁyeva bhāsāparivattanavasena ceva punappunāgatavitthārakathāmaggassa saṁkhipanavasena ca akāsi.
anya-e0105n30:40_0: ‘‘Sā hi mahāaṭṭhakathāya, sāramādāya niṭṭhitā esā’’ti dī. ni. aṭṭha. 3.nigamanakathā ca;
anya-e0105n30:41_0: ‘‘Mūlaṭṭhakathāsāraṁ, ādāya mayā imaṁ karontenā’’ti dī. ni. aṭṭha. 3.nigamanakathā ca.
anya-e0105n30:42_3: Tenetaṁ ñāyati ‘‘suttantābhidhammesu mahāaṭṭhakathāto aññā mahāpaccariādināmikā porāṇikā sīhaḷaṭṭhakathāyo ceva andhakaṭṭhakathā ca natthī’’ti.
anya-e0105n30:42_4: Yāva vasabharājakālā (609-653) pana pākaṭānaṁ sīhaḷikattherānaṁ vinicchayo ca vādā ca vatthūni ca etāsupi dissantiyevāti.
